WelcomeSpeech: Welcome to the Specialized Alexa assistant.
WelcomeReprompt: You can ask me any questions about your bike or bike purchase
HelpSpeech: I can help you buy a brand new Specialized bike. Just say, recommend a bike. Or... I can also verbally insult you for not doing so.
HelpReprompt: Did you not hear me the first time? Say recommend a bike or get verbally insulted
